header_text: You are at the store when you see a friend, and stop to catch up with them. During this conversation, you're finding that your words come more slowly than usual. Despite these difficulties, talking to your friend is enjoyable.

elements.Text: Do you like catching up with your friend?

elements.name: You are at the store when you see a friend, and stop to catch up with them. During this conversation, you're finding that your words come more slowly than usual. Despite these difficulties, talking to your friend is enjoyable. _Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
